headlines.title: Inside the stealth EV production facility backed by Bezos
headlines.description: Slate Auto hopes its modular, stripped-down vehicle will be the future of affordable EVs, but it has a long road ahead.

headlines.title: Body of Thai hostage recovered from Gaza, Israel says
headlines.description: Nattapong Pinta was captured alive and was likely killed during the first months of captivity, the Israeli military says.

headlines.title: Russian Spies Are Suspicious of China, Even as Putin and Xi Grow Close
headlines.description: Russia’s spy hunters are increasingly worried about China’s espionage, even as the two countries grow closer.

headlines.title: Trump’s agenda bill: GOP senators’ top concerns in their own words
headlines.description: Republicans have set an ambitious deadline of trying to pass President Donald Trump’s sweeping agenda through Congress by the fourth of July. Hear senators describe in their own words their concerns and what they want to see changed in the weeks ahead.

headlines.title: How the U.S. became highly reliant on Elon Musk for access to space
headlines.description: Besides its flights to the International Space Station and Starship program, SpaceX is deeply embedded in the Department of Defense. The feud between Elon Musk and President Trump could end all that.

headlines.title: Judge approves landmark college sports settlement
headlines.description: The corrupt system of denying payment to college athletes has officially ended.

headlines.title: A Russian attack on the Ukrainian city of Kharkiv kills 3 people
headlines.description: Ukraine says that a large Russian drone-and-missile attack has targeted the eastern city of Kharkiv, killing at least three people and injuring 21.

headlines.title: Kharkiv hit by ‘most powerful attack’ of entire war, mayor says, as Russia pounds Ukraine again
headlines.description: Russia bombarded Ukraine’s second-largest city with massive strikes in the early hours of Saturday, its mayor said, one night after Moscow carried out one of the war’s largest aerial assaults on Ukraine.

headlines.title: The Trump-Elon Musk Feud Creates More Problems for Tesla
headlines.description: Already suffering from steep declines in sales and profit, the carmaker could now face the president’s wrath.

headlines.title: Trump’s International Student Ban Sparks Fear Among Harvard Attendees
headlines.description: Alfred Williamson could not have imagined how much his freshman year would be shaped by the Trump administration, inside and outside the classroom.
